data.title: Fascist Aesthetics and the Politics of Representation in Kawabata Yasunari
data.meta_description: Fascist Aesthetics and the Politics of Representation in Kawabata Yasunari was published in The Culture of Japanese Fascism on page 321.
data.text:
Cornyetz, Nina. "Fascist Aesthetics and the Politics of Representation in Kawabata Yasunari". The Culture of Japanese Fascism, edited by Alan Tansman, Rey Chow, Harry Harootunian and Masao Miyoshi, New York, USA: Duke University Press, 2009, pp. 321-354. https://doi.org/10.1515/9781478090885-015
